Parameters.Name: MEDIA-3-3-13 AUDIO ENCODER CONFIGURATION USE COUNT (ADD DIFFERENT AUDIO ENCODER CONFIGURATIONS IN PROFILE)

Test.ONVIFTestID: AUDIO ENCODER CONFIGURATION USE COUNT (ADD DIFFERENT AUDIO ENCODER CONFIGURATIONS IN PROFILE)
Test.TestName: AUDIO ENCODER CONFIGURATION USE COUNT (ADD DIFFERENT AUDIO ENCODER CONFIGURATIONS IN PROFILE)
Test.Name: Correct response
Test.Description: Check Audio Encoder Configuration use count when adding different Audio Encoder Configuration to profile

Test.ONVIFTestID: AUDIO ENCODER CONFIGURATION USE COUNT (ADD DIFFERENT AUDIO ENCODER CONFIGURATIONS IN PROFILE)
Test.TestName: AUDIO ENCODER CONFIGURATION USE COUNT (ADD DIFFERENT AUDIO ENCODER CONFIGURATIONS IN PROFILE)
Test.Name: Wrong UseCount 1
Test.Description: UseCount value is wrong after adding Audio Encoder Configuration "AEC1"

Test.ONVIFTestID: AUDIO ENCODER CONFIGURATION USE COUNT (ADD DIFFERENT AUDIO ENCODER CONFIGURATIONS IN PROFILE)
Test.TestName: AUDIO ENCODER CONFIGURATION USE COUNT (ADD DIFFERENT AUDIO ENCODER CONFIGURATIONS IN PROFILE)
Test.Name: Wrong UseCount 2
Test.Description: UseCount value is wrong for "AEC1" after adding Audio Encoder Configuration "AEC2"

Test.ONVIFTestID: AUDIO ENCODER CONFIGURATION USE COUNT (ADD DIFFERENT AUDIO ENCODER CONFIGURATIONS IN PROFILE)
Test.TestName: AUDIO ENCODER CONFIGURATION USE COUNT (ADD DIFFERENT AUDIO ENCODER CONFIGURATIONS IN PROFILE)
Test.Name: Wrong UseCount 3
Test.Description: UseCount value is wrong for "AEC2" after adding Audio Encoder Configuration "AEC2"

Test.ONVIFTestID: AUDIO ENCODER CONFIGURATION USE COUNT (ADD DIFFERENT AUDIO ENCODER CONFIGURATIONS IN PROFILE)
Test.TestName: AUDIO ENCODER CONFIGURATION USE COUNT (ADD DIFFERENT AUDIO ENCODER CONFIGURATIONS IN PROFILE)
Test.Name: Correct fault (not fixed Profile exists)
Test.Description: DUT returns Action/MaxNVTProfiles on CreateProfile and not fixed Profile exists

Test.ONVIFTestID: AUDIO ENCODER CONFIGURATION USE COUNT (ADD DIFFERENT AUDIO ENCODER CONFIGURATIONS IN PROFILE)
Test.TestName: AUDIO ENCODER CONFIGURATION USE COUNT (ADD DIFFERENT AUDIO ENCODER CONFIGURATIONS IN PROFILE)
Test.Name: Correct fault (all Profiles are fixed)
Test.Description: DUT returns Action/MaxNVTProfiles on CreateProfile and all Profiles are fixed

Test.ONVIFTestID: AUDIO ENCODER CONFIGURATION USE COUNT (ADD DIFFERENT AUDIO ENCODER CONFIGURATIONS IN PROFILE)
Test.TestName: AUDIO ENCODER CONFIGURATION USE COUNT (ADD DIFFERENT AUDIO ENCODER CONFIGURATIONS IN PROFILE)
Test.Name: Not enough AECs
Test.Description: DUT returns less than 2 AECs at GetAudioEncoderConfigurations response message

Test.ONVIFTestID: AUDIO ENCODER CONFIGURATION USE COUNT (ADD DIFFERENT AUDIO ENCODER CONFIGURATIONS IN PROFILE)
Test.TestName: AUDIO ENCODER CONFIGURATION USE COUNT (ADD DIFFERENT AUDIO ENCODER CONFIGURATIONS IN PROFILE)
Test.Name: No compatible AECs
Test.Description: Dut did not send compatible AECs

Test.ONVIFTestID: AUDIO ENCODER CONFIGURATION USE COUNT (ADD DIFFERENT AUDIO ENCODER CONFIGURATIONS IN PROFILE)
Test.TestName: AUDIO ENCODER CONFIGURATION USE COUNT (ADD DIFFERENT AUDIO ENCODER CONFIGURATIONS IN PROFILE)
Test.Name: Only one compatible AECs
Test.Description: DUT sent only one compatible AEC

Test.ONVIFTestID: AUDIO ENCODER CONFIGURATION USE COUNT (ADD DIFFERENT AUDIO ENCODER CONFIGURATIONS IN PROFILE)
Test.TestName: AUDIO ENCODER CONFIGURATION USE COUNT (ADD DIFFERENT AUDIO ENCODER CONFIGURATIONS IN PROFILE)
Test.Name: Correct response (find compatible AECs with 2nd attempt)
Test.Description: DUT returns compatible AECs with 2nd attempt
